name: Sentinel Nodes Exam
title: Sentinel Lymph Nodes Examined
description: Records the total number of lymph nodes sampled during the sentinel node biopsy and examined by the pathologist
notes: **Note:**  Record this field even if there has been preoperative treatment.
rows: 1 - 89 Sentinel nodes were examined (code the exact number of sentinel lymph nodes examined)
No sentinel nodes were removed, but aspiration of sentinel node(s) was performed
Sentinel lymph nodes were biopsied, but the number is unknown

It is unknown whether sentinel nodes were examined
Not stated in medical record
